pageContext.claim: “The Washington Post Story, about my speech in North Carolina and tweet, with its phony sources who do not exist, is Fake News. The only thing people were talking about is the record setting crowd and the tremendous enthusiasm, far greater than the Democrats. You'll see in 2020!”
pageContext.analysis: There’s no reason to believe the Washington Post story was not accurate. Trump did not silence racist chants and call four minority congresswomen — all citizens — to “go back” to the “totally broken and crime infested places from which they came.”
